codes.INST: Instructions used to ease automatic request processing.
codes.RELY: Instructions used to ease automatic request relay.
codes.SHPG: Additional shipping information not otherwise specified.
codes.SHPM: Information concerning the letters, numbers or other symbols placed on the outside of cargo to facilitate identification.
codes.SLDC: Information concerning the domicile location of the seller.
